column2:
"Thank you, senpai. I hate always having to rely on you.
...Thanks for putting up with me."
"Your skills are just as on point as ever. I can see I still have no hope of catching up to you."
"After all, you're the best fighter I know, senpai."

"I hope you'll always have time for my requests.
...I'm counting on you, senpai."
